sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useProducts } from '../../context/context' export const Sales = () => { const { sales } = useProducts() return (
{sales.map(sale => (

  • {sale.products.map(products => products + " ")}

    {sale.prices.map(price => price + " ")}

    Total: {sale.value}

    {sale.date}

))}
) }
